verses.name: Isaiah 13:5
verses.text: They come from a far country, from the end of heaven, even the Lord, and the weapons of his indignation, to destroy the whole land.

verses.name: Isaiah 13:6
verses.text: Howl ye; for the day of the Lord is at hand; it shall come as a destruction from the Almighty.

verses.name: Isaiah 13:7
verses.text: Therefore shall all hands be faint, and every man’s heart shall melt:

verses.name: Isaiah 13:8
verses.text: And they shall be afraid: pangs and sorrows shall take hold of them; they shall be in pain as a woman that travaileth: they shall be amazed one at another; their faces shall be as flames.
